description: The Bourbon Strawberry Iced Tea is the perfect summer sipper, with its mellow flavor and cool, fruity notes. Whether you're planning to celebrate the&nbsp;Fourth of July or any other day that calls for something tall, easy to drink, and delicious, this cocktail is a crowd-pleaser.It's incredibly simple to make. Whether you're prepping multiple batches for a party or just making one for yourself as you sit back and soak up the&nbsp;summer sun, this cocktail comes together in no time at all.This delicious cocktail features muddled strawberries, lemon juice,&nbsp;bourbon, and simple syrup, shaken with ice and poured over fresh unsweetened tea. For a pretty garnish, add some berries and mint.This drink is a perfect Derby Day cocktail that your guests will love. So make a batch (or two) and enjoy the race!
